title: Chief Complaint
content: Increasing numbness and tingling in the right hand.

title: HPI Spencer
content: The patient, diagnosed with lymphoma and recently completing chemotherapy, reports increased numbness and tingling in her right hand. She also experienced a burn on her right thumb, complicating tasks like putting on earrings and reducing phone usage.

title: Musculoskeletal
content: Bilateral upper extremity skin is clean, dry, and intact without erythema or ecchymosis. Moderate tenderness of the right small finger with triggering and a nodule present. Excellent range of motion overall; PCGs are normal.

title: Assessment
content: Numbness and tingling in the right hand

title: Plan
content: Recommend night splints for carpal tunnel
